p:
ClusterONE algorithm was implemented on each metalPN to decompose large network into dense protein hubs
36 . Each protein hub represents the core functional component of metalPN. The top-ranked hub of each metalPN was selected to determine its involvement in PD. For which, the text-mining approach was carried out to collect the proteins reported in PD from literature and mapped to each top-ranked hub of 24 metalPN to select PD hubs.
